item.title: Array Operations
item.description: Insert element in an array 1static int insert(int arr[], int n, int x, int capacity, int position) { 2 if(n == capacity) return n; 3 int idx = position - 1; 4 for(int i = n - 1; i >= idx; i--){ 5 arr[i + 1] = arr[i]; 6 } 7 arr[idx] = x; 8 return n + 1; 9 } Search for an element in an array
